summary: This is a communication record from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 14, 2019, which is the day after Jeffrey Epstein's death. It appears to be a fax or email transmission header, indicating communication between the MCC and the US Department of Justice.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein's Death
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The date is inferred as the document is from the day after his death.

keyFacts: The document is dated August 14, 2019, the day after Jeffrey Epstein's death.
It originates from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, where Epstein died.
It is a communication record between the MCC and the US Department of Justice.
The document is a header for a transmission (fax/email), suggesting official communication regarding the facility or incident.
The file name EFTA00122382.pdf indicates it is part of the Epstein case document release.
